msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane City of Spokane Falls

R.J. Luck, being duly sworn on such complaint that at the city of Spokane Falls Spokane County Territory of Washington on the 21 day of November 1885, Frankie Sutsinger did wilfully unlawfully & maliciously keep a house within the limits of the city of Spokane Falls, in which other persons smoke or inhale opium contrary to the provisions and in violation of an ordination of said city, entitled "an ordinance prohibiting the smoking or inhaling of opium"-passed by the city council Dept 9th 1885, agreed and & dignity of the Territory of Washington Subscribed & sworn to before me Nov. 13, 1885} R.J. Rush J.G. Paul Justice of the Peace
Filed November 23rd, 1885 J J L Peel J. P.
